snippet: Gunmen opened fire on Muslim worshipers on Sunday as they were leaving a mosque in northern Nigeria, killing at least 20 people, a local official said.
abstract: Gunmen armed with assault rifles attack rural village in northern Nigeria, killing at least 24 people, including worshipers leaving a mosque.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen opened fire on Muslim worshipers on Sunday as they were leaving a mosque in northern Nigeria, killing at least 20 people, a local official said.

headline.main: Gunmen Kill Worshipers Leaving Mosque in Nigeria
headline.print_headline: Gunmen Kill Worshipers Leaving Mosque in Nigeria
